item.description:
Looking for an opportunity to practice your German? Come to a meetup with an international flair!
No formal presentations or homework! Just come join us for Kaffee und Kuchen and chat. Whether you have learned German in Germany or have studied it in college, high school or on your own, welcome!!
This is a first meeting, so please bring an adventurous spirit!
Dianne
item.name: The West Hartford German Language March Meetup
